item.name: Broken Lantern
item.desc: A broken lantern that belongs to Yuyuko Saigyouji. Used to attract ghosts to whoever is carrying it.

item.name: Tengu Feather
item.desc: The sacred feather that marks the owner as one of the Order of the Red Feathers. Allows passage to the uppor portions of Youkai Mountain.

item.name: Mirror Fragment
item.desc: Nitori says that this fragment contains an immense amount of magical energy, but we don't know how to use it yet.

item.name: Wooden Statue
item.desc: A crudely carved wooden statue.

item.name: Dusty Talisman
item.desc: A talisman that was once used as in exorcising demons.

item.name: Cell Phone
item.desc: A small device that allows people to communicate across large distances

item.name: Ibis Tapestry
item.desc: A beautiful scroll painting of a crested ibis, the illusionary bird.

item.name: Magic Lamp
item.desc: A treasure from a faraway desert land said to grant wishes. It seems to be just an ordinary lamp now.

item.name: Gondolier's Glove
item.desc: A simple, white glove that exudes elegance and grace.

item.name: Parasol
item.desc: A red and white parasol that is good for sheltering you from the rain and hitting people.

item.name: Witch's Book of Spells
item.desc: Contains a lot of advanced spells written in an archaic language. Definitely not for beginning magicians. Part of a collection of sorcery books.

item.name: Lucky Cat
item.desc: Also known as Maneki-neko. This statue is said to bring good luck to its owner.

item.name: Angel Feather
item.desc: The feather of one of the beings who are said to live beyond the sky. Those who hold this feather are given divine blessings.

item.name: Mirror of Truth
item.desc: A magical mirror which can dispel any illusions and reveal the truth.

item.name: Essense of Spring
item.desc: A preserved packet of cherry blossom petals bearing the scent of spring.

item.name: Lava Rock
item.desc: A small glowing flame is encased in this red rock. Used as a Fire element spell synthesis item.

item.name: Rain Tear
item.desc: The faint sound of raindrops can be heard from this blue stone. Used as a Water element spell synthesis item.

item.name: Rough Diamond
item.desc: This shimmering diamond was freshly dug out of the ground. Used as an Earth element spell synthesis item.

item.name: Ancient Amber
item.desc: Long ago, a rare amber crystalized and trapped an insect inside. Used as a Wood element spell synthesis item.

item.name: Iron Ore
item.desc: A crystal for synthesizing Metal element.
